title: NewCryptocasinos
author: NewCryptocasinos
content: We just had a look at SoftSwiss gambling reports on crypto gambling and the most common cryptocurrencies used for online gambling with crypto.We are a bit surprised about the list below. We are not surprised to see BTC in the lead; it's the king of gambling  and the king of everything else as well, hehe. However we were pretty sure we would find Tron or at least Solana in the top 5. I mean, Litecoin has been a very popular currency for gambling in the past, but who bet with it nowadays? What do you guys think about the list? I mean, SoftSwiss is a very trustworthy source, since they have data from a large number of casinos, but isn't it a bit weird?Most Popular Cryptocurrencies in iGamingBitcoin (73.3%)Ethereum (9.9%)Litecoin (6.6%)Tether (4.6%)Dogecoin (3.1%)Source https://www.softswiss.com/news/state-of-crypto-2023-report/https://wagerx.io/

comments.body: Tether is kind of a no-brainer, but with Litecoin and Dogecoin I assume it's mostly because they've been around quite a bit longer than Solana and Tron.
